job.title: Data Scientist
job.description:
The New York Times is a technology company committed to producing the world's most reliable and highest quality journalism. Our ability to do so relies on an accomplished team of expert technologists who help NYT leverage the tremendous abundance of data unique to this company. We are looking for a Lead Data Scientist to use machine learning techniques to power groundbreaking, new products.
You will join our diverse group of Data Scientists from academic and industry backgrounds. You will report to a Director of Data Science and initially lead the expansion of our advertising business and mentor other Data Scientists on the team. In this role, you will:
